game.name: Easter Cookies
game.description:
Easter is here and now many of people in the town are pretty excited to be a part of an egg hunt party. No Easter party is complete without extremely delicious Easter Cookies. In this free online game, you will get a chance to show your cooking skills by preparing the mouth-watering Easter Cookies. Easter Cookies makes sure that you will be allowed here to perform various jobs right from preparing the dough of the cookies, baking and decorating them in the optimum way possible. Do not hesitate in using as much sprinkle as you can to make your dessert look awesome. 

All the useful ingredients and tools are available here for you to get your job done perfectly. Apply your skills, combine ingredients in a correct order and start baking and decorating your food in this cool recreational activity for girls. Easter cookies are like the gingerbread cookies. Thus, this newest cooking game surely gives you great fun and entertainment if you have already played our gingerbread cookies game. The major features of Easter Cookies include easy control, realistic looking gaming background, fabulous graphics and finest gameplay. 

Our kitchen is filled up with all the useful ingredients and tools, so you do not have to face any unwanted hurdles to get your favorite cookies prepared on time. This one of the finest online gaming works is designed for teens, kids and grown-ups. Many adults from all across the world also love to play this awesome decorating game due to various reasons. Play this latest cooking game today and try this cookies recipe in real under the supervision of your mom!
